title: Ex-US attorney says he quit because he heard Trump was considering firing him
description: The Senate Judiciary Committee on Wednesday will interview Byung "BJay" Pak, the former US attorney in Atlanta who departed abruptly from the role amid then-President Donald Trump's attacks on Georgia's election results.

title: Cognac and cigars: The golden age of inflight meals
description: Inflight dining was far from its glory days even before Covid ensured everything was plastic-wrapped and pre-ordered. We look back on the golden age when plane snacks meant caviar and truffles, not pretzels

title: Classified report into Covid origins drafted by US intelligence officials
Fear and resentment reign in Afghanistan as Taliban overruns more cities
House Democrats can get some of Trump's tax records from accounting firm, judge rules
description: The US House should be able to access some of Donald Trump's tax records through a subpoena to his accounting firm Mazars USA, a federal judge in Washington, DC, ruled on Wednesday.

title: Intel officials draft classified report as they near end of Covid probe
description: • Australian Olympians forced to undergo 'double quarantine' of 28 days on return home

title: This deam vacation spot has two major problems: Debt and climate crisis
description: Former Maldives President Mohamed Nasheed, the Climate Vulnerable Forum's Ambassador for Ambition, discusses the climate report. Nasheed advocates for wealthy nations paying to help vulnerable countries deal with the impact of climate change.

title: The stunning fall of a US political giant is a warning to others
US Senate approves $3.5 trillion blueprint for transforming America
description: Senate Democrats approved a $3.5 trillion budget resolution early Wednesday morning, setting the stage in the weeks and months to come for the party to craft and attempt to pass a sweeping economic package expanding the social safety net that President Joe Biden has made a signature agenda item without the threat of a filibuster from Republicans who oppose it.

title: 'Jeopardy' will replace Alex Trebek with not one, but two hosts
description: When the new season of "Jeopardy!" debuts on September 13, executive producer Mike Richards will be behind the host lectern.

title: The nightmare of the Greek island of Evia: Searing heat, choking smoke and ferocious fires
description: At times it feels like the air itself is burning here on Evia.  The smell and taste of smoke is ever-present; ash falls from the sky like sinister confetti.

title: The nightmare of an island devoured by flames
Some leaders are blaming arson for the wildfires. Others are using the climate crisis for cover.
description: Wildfires tearing across the Mediterranean have killed dozens of people and reduced entire villages to ash. Some leaders have emphasized the role of arsonists in the devastation, while others have been accused of using climate change as a cover for their own poor disaster management. The result is a confusing message of who and what is to blame.

title: Sudan to hand ex-President Omar al-Bashir to ICC
description: The Sudanese government will hand Omar al-Bashir over to the International Criminal Court (ICC) along with other officials wanted over the Darfur conflict, according to a Cabinet of Ministers in a statement to CNN.

title: John Roberts and the Supreme Court might block anything Democrats do on voting rights
MTV VMAs 2021: See who's nominated
description: Nominees for the 2021 MTV Video Music Awards were revealed Wednesday.

title: Hung Liu, artist who documented the immigrant experience, has died at 73
description: Artist Hung Liu, whose striking portraits depicted life in Maoist China and the American immigrant experience, has died at age 73.

title: De La Soul's catalog coming to streaming
description: The flower children of hip hop are coming to a streaming service near you.

title: Scientists say this invisible gas could seal our fate on climate change
description: Slashing carbon dioxide emissions is critical to ending the climate crisis. But, for the first time, the UN climate change report emphasized the need to control a more insidious culprit: methane, an invisible, odorless gas with more than 80 times more warming power in the near-term than carbon dioxide.

title: The 10 Senate seats most likely to flip
description: The passage of a sweeping infrastructure plan in the Senate on Tuesday gives both parties plenty of ammunition heading into a midterm campaign season -- look no further than the most competitive Senate seats for how that will play out.

title: Does mask wearing harm your child's development? Experts weigh in
description: For young children, the pandemic comes at a crucial time for developing skills important for empathy, safety and more -- a phase that some parents worry will be impaired by mask-wearing.

title: Samsung's new foldable phones: Cheaper, more durable, equipped with an under-screen camera
description: Samsung is still betting on a future where smartphones fold in half. But first it must convince users that's a future they want.

title: Stress is normal, until it's not. How to tell the difference
description: Stress is an everyday occurrence for most people, but too much of it could be signs of a deeper issue.

title: Whistleblower demoted by Trump speaks out about US pandemic response
description: Dr. Rick Bright, the former vaccine director ousted by the Trump administration after filing a whistleblower complaint about the HHS promoting hydroxychloriquine, says that "hundreds of thousands" of lives would have been saved is Trump and his administration had told the truth and followed the science about Covid-19.

title: China is banning karaoke songs that endanger national unity
description: China will create a "blacklist" of karaoke songs, banning those that contain "harmful content" from entertainment venues.

title: YouTube suspends Rand Paul for seven days
description: Sen. Rand Paul, a Kentucky Republican, has been suspended from YouTube for seven days over a video claiming that masks are ineffective in fighting Covid-19, according to a YouTube spokesperson.

title: Late night comics pull no punches on Gov Cuomo's resignation
description: Late night hosts took jabs at New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo who announced he is resigning after a report found he had sexually harassed 11 women.

title: Leo Messi talks to CNN
description: Football superstar Leo Messi tells CNN's Amanda Davies that he believes Paris Saint-Germain is the "ideal" place for him to win the Champions League again.

title: Chet Hanks, whose parents were hospitalized with Covid-19, rants against vaccines and masks
description: Chet Hanks has posted a rant against coronavirus vaccines and told sufferers of the virus to "get over it," a year after his parents, Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson, were hospitalized with severe cases of Covid-19.

title: Chinese court sentences Canadian to 11 years in prison for spying
description: A Chinese court has sentenced Canadian businessman Michael Spavor to 11 years in prison for espionage.

title: Senator Booker rails against Republican colleague's claim
description: Sen. Cory Booker (D-NJ) gives a passionate response after Sen. Tommy Tuberville (R-AL) called for a vote on an amendment that would punish local jurisdictions that defund the police.

title: British embassy worker accused of spying for Russia arrested
description: A British embassy employee suspected of spying for Russia has been arrested in the German city of Potsdam, British and German authorities said on Wednesday.

title: Stevie Nicks cancels US tour dates, citing rising Covid-19 cases
description: Rock icon Stevie Nicks has canceled a string of upcoming US shows due to concern over the rising number of Covid-19 cases.

title: Messi says PSG is the best place for him to win the Champions League again
Perseid meteor showers are set to be a showstopper celestial event
description: The Perseid meteor shower will grace the summer skies in mid-August as one of the biggest showers of the year.

title: Dubai is building an art collection -- without buying any art
description: Positioned between Africa, Europe and Asia, Dubai is open to artistic and cultural influences from around the world. This has led to a vibrant, emerging local arts scene.

title: China's recent rape scandals are a #MeToo victory, activists say
description: Two explosive rape allegations have rocked China in recent weeks, turning a spotlight on the country's stifled #MeToo movement and problems of sexual assault.

title: 5 fashion takeaways from the 'Sex and the City' reboot
description: Ever since HBO Max released the first promotional image from "Sex and the City" spinoff "And Just Like That..." in early July, fans and fashion obsessives have been dissecting the returning characters' looks, sans Kim Cattrall's Samantha.

title: Who is Prince Andrew? The 'spare heir' facing a sexual abuse lawsuit
description: There was a time when Prince Andrew had it all: A decorated war hero, a playboy prince, an international ambassador for the British brand, living the life of privilege. But those days seem long gone. Instead, the Duke of York -- who is ninth in line to the British throne -- is now being sued for alleged sexual abuse.

title: Rudy Guiliani selling customized messages on Cameo
description: Rudy Giuliani is now selling customized messages on Cameo for $199. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports on his first paid shout-outs.
